item.title: Ansible Part 1
item.description: Set up an AWS instance Download the ssh key for the user which is a pem key then use Putty Gen to import the pem key and save it as a ppk key Then use ec2-user@instancename on port 22 and save session In auth filed use the ppk key to connect EPEL Release epel-release is available in Amazon Linux Extra topic “epel” To use, run sudo amazon-linux-extras install epel
